I believe this offers a fair deal considering the quality and uniqueness of the product. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer
